are_going_back_home: You are going back to the home.
pass_the_phone: Pass the phone to a player from {}
goalDescription: Taboo is a team game. The goal is to score more points than the opposing teams. In turn, a player called the 'Guesser' will hold this cellphone and try to make their teammates guess the secret word (the word in gray on the top of the screen) without using any of the taboo words related to that term (list of words in black).
preparationDescription: Form teams of 2 to 5 players with an even number of players (at least two players per team). Arrange the players in a circle, alternating players from each team. One person from the first team will start in the role of 'Guesser', which is the person who must make their team members guess a word without using any taboo words.
pointsDescription:
For each guessed word, press the green button and earn a point. 

For each taboo word pronounced or rule infringement, press the red button and lose one point.
